body_html:
The gradients defined in tensorflow/core/ops/*_grad.cc are not the c++ gradients, they are gradients for FunctionDef's. Very confusing I know :(. We are hoping to simplify/maybe make the FunctionDef's use the c++ gradients defined in tensorflow/cc/gradients eventually.

For now, the gradients defined in tensorflow/core/ops should be ignored.
